item.description:
Hi Everyone!!  Sorry for the late notice but things have been pretty hectic for me in the month of March. As I am writing this I am in Florida for a celebration of life for a close friend who passed from breast cancer. This amazing woman was told she had months to live and remarkably lived for 6 happy years with no chemo or radiation....only good organic foods and supplementation.  The only reason that she died is because she ran out of money and as you know insurance is only willing to pay for drugs.  The reason I run the meetup is to hopefully help people realize that our food is killing us and most of all there are things we can do to change that.

 Fri April 6 Potluck!  Bring an organic raw vegan dish enough for 6-8 people.  If you are new and not sure what to bring a salad (fruit or veggie) is always great.

 MOVIE NIGHT!!  "Average Joe on Raw"  A great new fun and informative movie which really shows how if you are eating a Standard American Diet your body gets depleted of necessary nutrients at a very young age.  We are walking around in our 20's thinking we can conquer the world not realizing how devastating our SAD is to our health.  This is a must see!

Please note meetup is starting at 6.  Movie no later than 7:15.

Have a terrific week!  Can't wait to see everyone!!

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: April potluck!!!
